price: 144. Yalli Nabii Muusak: diggah Muusaw Anu inni farmoomaay inni yaabah Sinaamak fanaak koo doorite, toysa Nubuwwannuu kee muxxok koh eceem beetaay Yalla faatita marih num tik kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāmūsā innī iṣ'ṭafaytuka ʿalā al-nāsi birisālātī wabikalāmī fakhudh mā ātaytuka wakun mina al-shākirīna
